services.name: Microcurrent
services.description: Microcurrent facials increase cellular activity by helping to tighten and smoothen the muscles and connective tissues of the face.
benefits: increased natural production of collagen and elastin
moreInfo: Microcurrent facial at Ell Glow offers powerful and effective tool to aid in the battle of anti-aging by diminishing the appearance of the skin, and reducing the overall visual appearance of aging.The mild electrical pulses stimulate your facial muscles, and create a more toned and lifted appearance with regular use-just like a sculpting gym workout for your face. Microcurrent's main benefits go far beyond that of just a lift: it also boosts circulation, enhances penetration of skincare products, and stimulates collagen and elastin production. Additionally, it stimulates ATP( adenosine triphosphate), which is essentially muscle energy.

services.name: Age defyne
process: Double cleansing, exfoliation, extraction, massage, microcurrent, mask, moisturizer SPF / night cream, eye cream, lip balm.
services.description: Promote feeling of being cleansed and refreshed, removes excess sebum, impurities, and pollution for clean skin that feels fresh.

services.name: Facial massage
services.description: Stimulating every muscle on your face inside and out, creating defined cheekbones, sculpted jawline and refreshed face.
moreInfo: Stimulating every muscle on your face inside and out, creating defined cheekbones, sculpted jawline and refreshed face.
ENDOSPHERES SCULPTING FACIAL MASSAGE
Complete facial rejuvenation, working every single muscle beneath the skin to ensure tone, elasticity, collagen production and more defined contours of the face using micro-vibration technology.
BUCCAL MASSAGE

Absolute innovation in face lifting and sculpting, modern youth potion using unique manual techniques, improves fine lines, quality of epidermis, blood circulation and effective lymphatic drainage. This treatment is performed by innovative and renowned therapist worldwide. Working carefully inside the cheek, lip and jawline, our professional therapist becomes a skillful sculptor, creating ideal, youth-like lines. A course of 5-8 treatments is recommended for best results.
FACE REJUVENATION WITHOUT INJECTION
Face massage is done by simultaneously massaging the inner and outer muscles of the mouth. Working carefully inside the cheek, lip and jawline. It's not associated with injection therapy.
ANTI-STRESS EFFECT
Sculptured lifting face massage guaranty to eliminate psycho-emotional blocks and helps to cope with stress.

services.name: Deep cleansing manual facial
process: Double cleansing with ultrasonic spatula, enzyme exfoliation, extra-extraction, toner, light massage, mask, moisturizer SPF / night cream, eye cream, lip balm.
services.description: Deep cleansing treatment is vital for healthy radiant skin while removing build-up of impurities, bacteria and dirt with manual extraction if necessary.
benefits: gives fresh, breathable and radiant skin
moreInfo: Bespoke treatment designed for your clear, glowing, healthy skin. A deep cleansing manual facial at Ell Glow skincare studio is the physical removal of debris and clogging from pores to ensure a flawless complexion.

This Facial treatment is available for anyone who is looking for clean and glowing skin, suitable for all ages and all skin types. Cosmetic products used in the process depend on your skin type and chosen during your consultation, for best suited deep cleansing facial program.
WE TREAT A VARIETY OF SKING ISSUES

After the skin assessment, getting a regular bespoke facial treatment will help treat any issues and heal your skin. From blackheads, sunspots and sun damage to loss of firmness and elasticity, it can be minimized or completely treated with the right facial treatment.
SKING REJUVINATION

The exfoliation, extraction, massage, steam and mask application during a facial treatment lead to skin rejuvenation, or in other words — a fresh, renewed skin. This improves the appearance of the skin, giving it a healthy, radiant glow and balanced complexion.
A DEEP HYDRATION

Feed the skin with vitamins, minerals and nutrients such as vitamins A,C and E, as well as peptides and hyaluronic acid, a process that brings other benefits and will leave your complexion refreshed and radiant.
One treatment a month gives visible result.

services.name: Acne treatment
process: Double cleansing with ultrasonic spatula, enzyme exfoliation, extra-extraction, toner, high frequency treatment, light massage, clay mask, moisturizer SPF / night cream,  eye cream, lip balm
services.description: Innovative acne treatment fights the causes of acne with light frequencies to target bacteria and inflammation.
moreInfo: The technology uses a light-based system to treat both the cause and the visible symptoms of acne.

Contrary to what a lot of people think, acne is not limited to just adolescence. In fact, many people struggle with acne on the face and body well into their adult life. Unfortunately, acne continues to be one of the most common scarring problems doctors see. Acne is usually caused by overactive sebaceous gland that produce too much oil and clog pores.
Combined with the presence of P. acne bacteria, this is what leads to the blackheads, and inflammation associated with acne.
The innovative technology as High Frequency etc. treats both the underlining cause and the visible symptoms of acne.

It uses a combination of blue and red light delivered simulations — the blue light destroys acne-causing bacteria in the oil glands, while the red light reduces existing acne-related inflammation to promote faster healing.
Research has shown that when blue and red light are administers together, the results are much better than with just one light alone.
LYMPHATIC DRAINAGE
Enjoy smoother skin with a more even tone
VISIBLE RESULT
No downtime — resume regular activities immediately
TAILORED FOR YOUR SKIN
Customized treatment for maximum result — clear youthful radiant skin
BESPOKE
Tailor-made programs based on age, weight and build
SIMULATES MUSCLES
Improves use of energy and calories. Decreases fat mass and increases muscle mass by targeting 90% of muscle fibers
1 PER WEEK FOR A COURSE OF TREATMENTS
FAST RECOVERY TIME
IMMEDIATE VISIBLE RESULT

services.name: Aqua / Hydro facial
process: Double cleansing, enzyme exfoliation, AQUA/HYDRO TREATMENT, light manual extraction, toner, massage, mask, moisturizer SPF / night cream, eye cream, lip balm
services.description: Promote feeling of being cleansed and refreshed, removes excess sebum, impurities, and pollution for clean skin that feels fresh.
moreInfo: Hydra facial is an invigorating treatment that delivers long-term skin health. This supremely nourishing and pampering facial replenishes hydration and youthfulness. Combining deep cleansing, a light scrub and customized AHA/BHA exfoliation to regenerate skin at the subcutaneous level. Restorative creamy propolis and ginger massage cream, followed with an application of a nutritive oil complex and modeling mask.
Tailored to meet the specific needs of all skin types, it offers instant ,noticeable results with no downtime or irritation.

Only Hydra facial uses patented technology to cleanse, extract, and hydrate. Hydro facial super serum is made with nourishing ingredients that create an instantly gratifying glow flowing 5 easy steps:
DETOX
Lymphatic drainage that improves circulation of the lymph system and helps to eliminate toxins.
CLEANSE + PEEL
Uncover a new layer of skin with gentle exfoliation and relaxing resurfacing.
EXTRACT+ HYDRATE
Remove debris from pores with painless suction. Nourish with in twinset moisturizers that quench skin.
FUSE+PROTECT
Saturate the skin's surface with antioxidants and peptides to maximize your glow.
REJUVINATE
Finish with red and infrared LED lights to reduce and further stimulate collagen, supporting the natural production of Vitamin D.
IMPROVE YOUR SKIN IN DIFFERENT WAYS
It's main benefits include a more hydrated, bright, plump complexion. In addition, it can also improve signs of aging, reduce fine lines and wrinkles.
MINIMUM SIDE EFFECTS
Expect a little redness immediately following the treatment ,but it will quickly subside. Let your skin rest and soak up all of the benefits of the facial for the rest of the day.
SUITABLE FOR ANY AGE AND SKIN TYPE
This treatment will benefit teenagers with acne, as well as adults with pimples, wrinkles, and hyper-pigmentation.
Recommended once a month.
No lengthy recovery - VISIBLE RESULT

services.name: Chemical peel
services.description: Scientifically proven to restore skin health and improve skin texture or lack of firmness, lines and wrinkles, age spots or hyper pigmentation, active acne, acne spots, acne scars, and stretch marks.
moreInfo: Peel is a bio-revitalizing product in form of a peel, that is unique.

Skin peels work by harnessing the power of naturally occurring fruit acids and enzymes to deeply exfoliate and rejuvenate the skin. The treatment stimulates new cell growth and collagen production, helping to reveal fresher, cleaner brighter skin.
We offer a wide variety of industry leading chemical peels that effectively remove the top layer of skin cells  to realign a softer, smoother complexion.
As with all our treatments, your initial appointment with our experts will determine what steps and procedures you need to follow in order to reach your skin aims.
Every skin peel we offer may benefit you skin by:
reducing fine lines and wrinkles
controlling oil production and fewer breakouts
diminished discoloration and a more even skin tone
increased cell turnover process
overall brightened skin tone
reduced inflammatory response
softer, smoother skin
Jessner peel - is a perfect treatment that prevents damaging skin, helps to regulate sebum production, normalizes keratonization, acne, etc.
Glycolic peel - this type of peel provides gentle treatment for fine lines, acne, chronically dry skin.
Mandelic M - perfect for aged skin, uneven pigmentation and blemishes (pregnancy spots, contraceptive, liver spots).
Customized treatment - individual solutions for a variety of skin problems.
Our peels are also available as add-ons to your chosen treatment.
Please see add-ons section for prices and descriptions.

services.name: High frequency + Acne treatment
process: Double cleansing, enzyme exfoliation, manual extraction, toner, HF, massage, mask, moisturizer SPF / night cream, eye cream, lip balm
services.description: High Frequency + acne treatment is considered a medical-grade treatment. Innovative acne treatment fights the causes of acne with high light frequency to target bacteria and inflammation.
moreInfo: Contrary to what a lot of people think, acne is not limited to just adolescence. In fact many people struggle with acne on the face and body well into their adult life. Unfortunately, acne continues to be one of the most common skincare problems doctors see.
Acne is usually caused by overactive sebaceous glands that produce too much oil and clog pores.
Combined with the presence of P. acnes bacteria, this is what leads to the blackheads, whiteheads, and inflammation associated with acne.
HF uses Intense Pulsed Light technology to treat both the underlying cause and the visible symptoms of acne.

It uses a combination of blue and red light delivered simultaneously - the blue light destroys acne-causing bacteria in the oil glands, while the red light reduces existing acne-related inflammation to promote faster-healing.
Research has shown that when blue and red light are administered together, the result are much better than with just blue light alone.
Recommended once per week for a course of treatment.
packageInfo: Acne treatment face and back - 90 min  - $190

services.name: Microdermabrasion
process: Advanced Environ products used, triple cleanse, dead skin cells are sloughed off the top layer of the skin with a gentle orbital microdermabrasion, gently revealing, fresh, plump healthy skin. Extractions are performed followed by a deeply nourishing and hydrating hyaluronic acid mask infusion using the micro-current to ionize the molecules and push them further into the skin. Instant results.
services.description: Microdermabrasion softens fine lines and wrinkles, smooths coarsely textured skin, decreases the appearance of scarring, decreases pore size and reduces superficial hyper-pigmentation.

services.name: Fresh and glow
process: Double cleansing, enzyme exfoliation, ULTRASONIC, SERUM MESOTHERAPY, treatment, light manual extraction, toner, massage, mask, moisturizer SPF / night cream, eye cream, lip balm
services.description: Non-needle mesotherapy. The perfect program for every skin type.
moreInfo: The treatment will benefit all skin types and all ages. Has no contraindications and is suitable for dealing with a wide range of problems.
Immediate results. Already after the first session, wrinkles are smoothed out, the oval of face is tightened, the skin becomes radiant and deeply hydrated.

services.name: Oxygen facial
process: Double cleansing, enzyme exfoliation, oxygen treatment, light manual extraction, toner, massage, mask, moisturizer SPF / night cream, eye cream, lip balm
services.description: This treatment is designed to nourish your skin and promote collagen production. It involves a technology that is used for spraying highly concentrated molecules of oxygen right into your epidermis (the outer layer of your skin). The oxygen that’s applied to your face and neck is infused with vitamins, minerals, essential nutrients, and botanical extracts.

services.name: European facial
process: Advanced Environ products used, triple cleanse, dead skin cells are sloughed off the top layer of the skin with a gentle orbital microdermabrasion, gently revealing, fresh, plump healthy skin. Extractions are performed followed by a deeply nourishing and hydrating hyaluronic acid mask infusion using the micro-current to ionize the molecules and push them further into the skin. Instant results.
services.description: Innovative treatment combining a range of advanced manual techniques with avant-garde products to rejuvenate your skin.

services.name: Men's facial
process: Double cleansing, enzyme exfoliation, light manual extraction, toner, massage, mask, moisturizer SPF / night cream, eye cream, lip balm
services.description: Promote feeling of being cleansed and refreshed, removes excess sebum, impurities, and pollution for clean skin that feels fresh.

services.name: Mini facial
process: Cleansing, enzyme exfoliation, toner, massage, mask, moisturizer SPF / night cream, eye cream, lip balm
services.description: Cleanse, exfoliate and boost cell renewal in one go. Helps smooth the surface of the skin, prevent the appearance of new wrinkles and tighten the contours of the face.

services.name: LED light treatment
process: A relaxing anti-aging facial includes Environs triple cleanse, steam, customized exfoliation and extractions. This is followed by a relaxing session of LED 830 nm. It is a wound healing wavelength that stimulates cell repair and rejuvenation from deep within the skin, penetrating to the dermal layer. The facial includes a beautiful relaxing hand, arm and foot massage and finished with a hydrating and skin softening Environ kaolin clay mask and shoulder massage.
services.description: A non-invasive light therapy that enhances and heals your skin. We will help you achieve a healthy glow you always dreamed of.
moreInfo: With LED lights therapy you can reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, acne, improve collagen production, resulting in the radiant, beautiful complexion you always dreamed of.
LED Light can be used as an add-on to our facials or a stand alone treatment.
STIMULATE FIBROBLASTS IN THE CELLS
The LED promotes the elasticity and youthfulness of your skin.
GET THAT HEALTHY GLOW

Revitalize and brighten your skin, by killing bacteria on your skin, physiotherapy prevents future breakouts and cleans the skin. It also promotes the building of collagen by helping cell metabolism, which then reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

other.name: Hair services
other.description: There is nothing more frustrating than not looking your best. Whether you are feeling low in confidence due to damaged hair, or you are simply short of time to manage your mane, Ell Glow is here to help with hair styling services for men and women.
benefits: no more weak and brittle hair

other.name: Hair removal | IPL laser
other.description: This treatment is one of the most effective ways to remove unwanted body of facial hair, quick and virtually painless . If you're tired of waxing and shaving but aren't quite sure if you're ready for laser treatment, this is for you.

other.name: Body treatments
other.description: Sculpt your body, lose unwanted fat, tighten the skin -  we have a solution that targets your area of concern. Our body treatments are the next easy step toward getting the kind of body you've always wanted.

other.name: Skin Tag | Pigmentation removal
other.description: Our highly effective treatments provide immediate and overtime results to lighten and improve most causes of hyperpigmentation.

mainText: Your time at Ell Glow is an experience like no other! You will be served by certified well trained specialists providing you an excellent level of service with top quality products and treatments.
At Ell Glow, we specialize in social facials for men and women alike. Our aim is to create a special personalized programs to care for the beauty and health of your skin and hair.
We source latest innovations, products and devices for your beauty and aesthetic needs. For the beauty you deserve , you need look no further than Ell Glow.
You're guaranteed to leave looking your best possible self!

reviews.text: What an amazing experience, in preperation for my flight abroad and I highly recommend it. I will definitely be back.
Absolutely wonderful, no matter what treatment I have had I always feel like a queen when I leave. Everyone is professional and accommodating.

I don’t know why it took me this long to get a facial because it was AMAZING. Elle did an outstanding job. From start to finish it was flawless. She was very kind, and knowledgeable of what she was doing. I highly recommend the aesthetics program & booking with Elle. I will be back to see her very soon!!

Elle asked me different kinds of questions to accurately categorise my skin type and which products will help me with my acne. Will def be back. Elle took care of all my needs, her hands are healing! Felt relaxed the entire time. The Glycolic peel was my favourite addition. Awesome, keep it up, going to recommend them to all my family!

I am beyond satisfied with the service provided by Elle. She did an amazing job on my facial. Very good communication she informed me of each product that was used. She’s very knowledgeable and friendly. I definitely recommend her services.

I went in for a facial with Elle and I loved it. She was very professional and would communicate and explain to me what she was going to do. I felt so relaxed and really enjoyed my facial with her. My skin felt great after and I would for sure go back with Elle for another facial.
This place is super cute and the girls working there are so nice. I just got a facial and I am glowing! They use European products and they have excellent service.

I've been going to the Ell Glow beauty and hair salon for a few month now and I love it! The first time i came in I had dark circles under my eyes and my skin looked dull. The staff at the salon recommended a series of treatments, so I got them done, and over time my skin looked brighter, younger, and firmer. The staff members are friendly, they remember me every time I come in. I absolutely enjoy every visit!
